greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Alternating sum of the cubes of the first n Fibonacci numbers.
comment: Natural bilateral extension (brackets mark index 0): ..., 674, 162, 37, 10, 2, 1, 0, [0], -1, 0, -8, 19, -106, 406, -1791, ... This is A005968-reversed followed by A119284.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-2,9,-3,-4,1).
formula: Let F(n) be the Fibonacci number A000045(n).
mathematica: a[n_Integer] := If[ n >= 0, Sum[ (-1)^k Fibonacci[k]^3, {k, 1, n} ], Sum[ -(-1)^k Fibonacci[ -k]^3, {k, 1, -n - 1} ] ]
results.author: _Stuart Clary_, May 13 2006
